APP_ID.description: ID of your Facebook App. See: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/development/create-an-app/app-dashboard#app-id

APP_SECRET.description: The Secret of your Facebook App. Your App secret can be found in App Dashboard -> Settings -> Basic

PAGE_ID.description: ID of your Facebook Page which is connected to Instagram

VERIFY_TOKEN.description: An arbitrary string that is used for the webhook verification request. See: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/getting-started/webhook-setup/

LOCALE.description: Optional code for experience locale, e.g. `en_US`. Must match a file in locales folder.
